title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Montreal, Quebec
content:
Photo submitted by Jean Marc Venne, “Picture taken… in Montreal Quebec Canada, fall color and light on my T-Lab X1 Ekar. Lunch break on the park trail to enjoy the sun between meetings.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Montreal, Quebec appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
